text: ELISA was performed on supernatants from challenged Jurkat T-cells to quantify <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> CXCL8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and TNF ( BD OptEIA Human <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Elisa Set , BD OptEIA Human <extra_id_0> CXCL8 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Elisa Set and BD OptEIA Human <extra_id_0> TNF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> Elisa Set , Biosciences , USA ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
Briefly , Jurkat T-cells were stimulated with PMA ( 162 nM ) for 1 h , centrifuged ( 1000 x g , 8 min ) and the supernatants were collected and stored at - 80degreesC until use .
Following centrifugation , the cells were resuspended in 1 h aged media , where cells have been grown in , containing PMA .
The same procedure was performed to collect media after 2 h and 6 h .
The final collection of media was performed after 24 h .
